means: 使隔开，使隐退( seclude的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: Altogether, it was a delightful town garden, peaceful and secluded.
sentence.Network_cn: 总体上说，这是个令人愉快的城市花园，宁静而偏僻。

sentence.Network_en: He is incommunicado in a secluded cottage in Wales.
sentence.Network_cn: 他隐居在威尔士一个偏僻的小村舍里。

sentence.Network_en: We were tucked away in a secluded corner of the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们安全地藏在房间一个隐蔽的角落里。

list.abs: the rich secluded themselves from contact with the poor ., 富人不肯同穷人接触.
重叶莲 callianthemus重楼 secluded chamber重楼 petiolate paris [root]
金榜起名网 - 林奕晴 ... (6)同本义[ forest;grove;woods] (9)指野外或退隐的地方[ secluded place] (1)光明[ bright].
That is a secluded place ., 那是个僻静的地方.
This is the quiet and most secluded area of the city ., 这是全城最安静最僻静的地区.

entry.def: A secluded place is quiet and private.

example.ex: We were tucked away in a secluded corner of the room...
example.tran: 我们被藏匿到房间里一个隐蔽的角落。

example.ex: We found a secluded beach a few miles further on.
example.tran: 我们又前行了几英里，发现了一处僻静的海滩。

means.word_mean: 1. hidden from general view or use;

sentences.sentence: "a privy place to rest and think"
"sat close together in the sequestered pergola"
"sitting under the reclusive calm of a shade tree"

auth_sentence.content: Thirty secluded villas are dotted above aforementioned Bounty-esque beach.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thirty secluded villas are dotted above aforementioned Bounty-esque beach.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thirty secluded villas are dotted above aforementioned Bounty-esque beach.

auth_sentence.content: Into a normal building in a secluded area.
auth_sentence.res_content: Into a normal building in a secluded area.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Into a normal building in a secluded area.

auth_sentence.content: After a short...conversation they proceeded...to a quiet and secluded restaurant.
auth_sentence.res_content: After a short...conversation they proceeded...to a quiet and secluded restaurant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: After a short...conversation they proceeded...to a quiet and secluded restaurant.

means.word_mean: 使隔绝的,使引退的,使隐居的

sentences.en: Some people like to strip themselves naked while they have a swim in a secluded place.
sentences.cn: 一些人当他们在隐蔽的地方游泳时,喜欢把衣服脱光。

sentences.en: This charming cottage dates back to the 15th century and is as pretty as a picture, with its thatched roof and secluded garden.
sentences.cn: 这所美丽的村舍是15世纪时的建筑,有茅草房顶和宁静的花园,漂亮极了,简直和画上一样。
